Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to compute the Davenport coherence function

computeCoherenceValue( locationJxCoord, locationJyCoord, locationJzCoord,locationKxCoord, locationKyCoord, locationKzCoord,frequency, locationJMeanSpeed, locationKMeanSpeed, exponentialDecayCx, exponentialDecayCy, exponentialDecayCz) -> float\n locationJxCoord = X coordinate of location J locationJyCoord = Y coordinate of location J locationJzCoord = Z coordinate of location J locationKxCoord = X coordinate of location K locationKyCoord = Y coordinate of location K locationKzCoord = Z coordinate of location K frequency = frequency value for which the coherence will be computed locationJMeanSpeed = Mean speed at location J locationKMeanSpeed = Mean speed at location K exponentialDecayCx = Exponential decay Cx exponentialDecayCy = Exponential decay Cy exponentialDecayCz = Exponential decay Cz

setTolerance( locationJ, locationK,frequency, locationJMeanSpeed, locationKMeanSpeed, exponentialDecayCx, exponentialDecayCy, exponentialDecayCz) -> float\n locationJ = A vector J locationK = A vector K frequency = frequency value for which the coherence will be computed locationJMeanSpeed = Mean speed at location J locationKMeanSpeed = Mean speed at location K exponentialDecayCx = Exponential decay Cx exponentialDecayCy = Exponential decay Cy exponentialDecayCz = Exponential decay Cz
